personal_info.name: Osama Alwaly
personal_info.title: Front-End Developer
personal_info.about_me: Software engineer passionate about building clean, scalable, and high-performance web/AI applications. Strong in Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, React/Next.js, Node.js, and Express. Interested in ML systems and developer experience.

experience.title: Intern – Electronics & Software Engineering
experience.company: Faculty of Engineering – Port Said University
description_points: Hands-on labs in electronics and applied engineering.
Practiced MATLAB for simulation and analysis.
Intro to software engineering: requirements and system design.

experience.title: Intern – Computer Networks
description_points: Configuration and troubleshooting of network infrastructure.

experience.title: Volunteer Speaker
experience.company: Pioneer of Success Initiative – Ministry of Youth and Sports
description_points: Delivered a live session on using LinkedIn for professional growth.
Showcased AI-powered tools for interview prep and job search.
Guided participants on CV optimization and online presence.

projects.name: SmartBrace
projects.short_description: AI-powered health monitoring ecosystem (bracelet + mobile + web).
projects.description: Built and deployed ML classification models (~90–95% accuracy) for real-time healthcare monitoring and disease prediction (stroke, autism, asthma). Integrated models with backend (FastAPI) and services for data flow.

projects.name: FitTrack (Gym Tracker)
projects.short_description: Web app for workouts, progress tracking, and plans.
projects.description: Next.js platform to log workouts, track progress, and manage personalized training plans with auth, animations, and responsive UI.

projects.name: UI/UX Design Collection
projects.short_description: A collection of mobile and web UI/UX projects showcasing clean layouts, structured flows, and modern visual identities.
projects.description: A unified set of UI/UX design projects including mobile applications, landing pages, and web interfaces. Each project focuses on user-centered design principles, clear information hierarchy, and visually consistent component systems. This category will continue expanding with new designs and interface concepts over time.
